lines.gurmukhi: suqn ky ipqw Ar BRwqn ky BRwqw Bey; Bwmn Bqwr hyq jnnI ky bwry hYN [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: My wondrous beloved master is son of sons, brother of brothers, beloved husband of wife and mother of child.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myry pRIqm puqRwˆ dy ipqw Aqy Brwvwˆ dy Brw hn, iesI qrHwˆ AwpxI iesqRI dy ipAwry pqI Aqy mwqw dy lwfly bwlk hn[

lines.gurmukhi: bwlk kY bwl buiD qrun sY qrunweI; ibRD sY ibRD ibvsQw ibsQwry hYN [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: He is childlike with children, youngman among the youth, old with elderly people.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: bwlkwˆ nwˆl auh bwl buiD vwly Bwv Boly BwlI ho ky vrqdy hn, juAwnwˆ nwl auh juAwn aumrw vwly ho ky vrqdy hn, qy ibRDwˆ nwl ibRD AvsQw dw vrqwau krdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: idRst kY rUp rMg surq kY nwd bwd; nwskw sugMiD rs rsnw aucwry hYN [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: He is beautiful to look at, listener of the musical melodies, relishers of fragrances and utterer of sweet words with his tongue.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nzr ivc rUp rMg ho ky kMnwˆ ivc nwd qy vwjy dI Awvwz ho ky, nwskw leI sugMDI ho ky rsnw auqy suAwd Ar aucwrx rUp ho ky ivAwp rhy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: Git AvGit nt vt AdBuq giq; pUrn skl BUq sB hI qY nÎwry hY [579[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Like a performer of strange acts, the beloved master is existing in strange form both in and out of the bodies. He is present in all bodies and yet is separate from all.  (579)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: srIrwˆ ivc jwˆ srIrwˆ qoˆ bwhr Bwv AMdr bwhr auh nt dI golI qrRwˆ Acrj gqI r`Kdy hn, swry srIr DwrIAwˆ ivc pUrn hn qy iPr sB qoˆ inAwry hn ]579]
